Guys, please let me post for the ball as to whether it hits the target or not. This should be fun :-)


::IR/Firearm/Cledar/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer::

IR nods. "Allright then."

She walks over and presses a button, and the beams split up. "Lets play! Stay in groups and work together. If the target is hit, the beams will back off a bit. They will also go for individuals more than groups, so work together."

She throws the ball into the beams, and it bounces off, heading for the group of Maximals. Iron Raptor backs up and watches them spring into action (hopefully), tapping a button to contact Cyndro.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm is the first to jump forward as the ball flies toward the group, hitting it toward the target. However, a beam hits it back and then rams Firearm, sending him down on his knees, gritting his teeth.

"Slagging things," he mutters as he jumps up and out of the way of a beam.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cledar and his group also get into action, the ball now flying toward Ratchet though. They spread out, however, ready to help out.
